recipeName: Vegan Spinach and Feta Stuffed Peppers
excerpt: These vegan stuffed peppers are filled with savory spinach and feta mixture and baked to perfection.

ingredients.name: Red Bell Peppers
ingredients.notes: halved, seeds and white pith removed

instructions.name: Preparation
instructions: Prepare the peppers by halving them and removing the seeds and white pith.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the crumbled tofu, chopped spinach, crumbled vegan feta, chopped red onion, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper.

instructions.name: Stuffing the Peppers
instructions: Fill each pepper half with the spinach and feta mixture, packing it in tightly.
Arrange the stuffed peppers in a baking dish, cover with foil, and bake for 30 minutes or until the peppers are tender and the filling is heated through.
Remove from the oven, garnish with fresh parsley leaves, and serve hot.
